ratings.comment: ESL118 is sure hard work, but Tim is really helpful -- he is always willing to answer your questions and give you advice.

The best ESL118 teacher ever. The course is heavy workload, but Tim makes it managebale. He's always available to answer question after class, and he really cares about students!.. Definitely recommend to take his class!!

Tries to make class engaging so you are not just pointlessly sitting around. Most of the classes are group work which is quite useful. Provides great feedback to papers and is a very generous grader if you follow his comments (or not, very flexible). Very flexible with deadlines (just ask him, he would almost never say no) and very caring. 11/10!
A really really good instructor. Can give you an extension. Don't give up on the class yet. It is not hard when your instructor tries so hard.

The best English instructor so far. Not only he's funny, but he also helps a lot. Just do what he asks you to do and you'll guarantee get the A. He will always give you advices on what to do and not to do. Don't ignore him.

Tim is absolutely amazing. I've always heard great things about him and decided to take his class in the summer. I'm positive at least 9 out of 10 students in class appreciate how thoughtful and understanding he is. He always knows what to say to motivate and help build students' confidence whenever needed.
Tim is a great professor and a generous grader! 118 is really a terrible class. Tim makes it better. Good luck!

ESL 118 sucks but having Tim as your instructor makes it bearable. He usually tries his best to help you if you ask and often gives extensions. He is a very understanding lecturer so be honest with him but don't take him for granted. If you incorporate his feedback well enough, you will definitely be happy with your grade.

Tim was a very lenient and helpful Proffessor. If you put effort in the assignments, Tim will respect that, and you will get your expected grade. You must expect work from ESL118, so work hard.  He will give extensions if you need them. I would retake this course with him if I had to, so its a YES from me.

Knows his stuff thoroughly, is well prepared and makes class super fun. Very approachable and always offers constructive suggestions to help you excel the course. Assignments keep coming at you endlessly, but then again, you're expected to write three research papers in a semester!

The course requires a lot of dedicated work but Tim is an excellent instructor. He is very supportive, helpful and is clear with instructions and feedback. He is also very understanding and gives you multiple opportunities if you talk to him and explain your problem.

Tim is a great instructor, his ratings are highly deceptive. He gives extensions usually, gives great feedback, spends a lot of time with you out of class to help you on coursework. Tim is only reason I did well in this class.

Tim is tough and sarcastic, but not exactly mean. He wants to see you succeed, but you need to ask for help when you want it. He gave me so many extensions and always accepted my late work, though he expects it before he wakes up. Don't give excuses, and be honest and open about what you've done and haven't done.
i give him 1.0 because there is  no 0 mark here .
He is not the worst one. Choose him if you have no choices for this class.
toughest grader of all professor of 118. and no helpful at all. i have not made any progress in this class. assignment feedbacks are sarcastic.  no one in the class like him. too picky too pushy.
